Author: dan.#2473
Content: It'd be good to know a max number of concurrent connections so the math can be figured out for number of LP's needed for a dICO. Or maybe an LP can be invisible if currently at the max, to avoid failed swaps due to networking issues

Author: ca333#0118
Content: i had atomicDEX nodes i run during the tests matching more than 10 swaps almost simultanously - even the swap process itself takes place concurrently as this is a real multhreading DEX engine.
